whileLookingForR: ^While looking for Ryan, you notice his receptionist Joanna isn't there.
^She moves around a lot, but calling her always helps.
^"Hey Joanna. Hey you wouldn't happen to know where Ryan Tremor is right? I have a couple of questions I'd like to ask him about the re-admittance of WERC Tech to Research and Development."
^"Last I saw, he went to R&D to check up on things."
^"No, but I imagine he will soon. Do you want me to get him a message about your inquiries tomorrow?"
^"No, I am in a bit of a hurry. Any chance you could just let me into R&D Joanna?"
^"Sorry friend, no can do. You know how he is."
